predicate.note: Frames file for 'overprice' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, surprise surprise.

roleset.name: charge too much

example.name: passive, no agent
example.text: ``Or if they feel the wine is overpriced *trace* and they can get something equally good for less.''

roleset.note: Probably should be viewed as an adjective, since I can't get any good readings with an agent present.
